product_name: Salomon Warden MNC 13 Downhill Ski Bindings - 90mm Brakes - 2014/2015
long_description: Compatible with both standard downhill boot soles as well as AT soles, the advanced-level Warden MNC 13 bindings have 90mm brakes and deliver precision to skiers weighing between 92 - 275 lbs..
short_description: Compatible with both standard downhill boot soles as well as AT soles, the advanced-level Warden MNC 13 bindings have 90mm brakes and deliver precision to skiers weighing between 92 - 275 lbs..
